long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Productivity improvement toolkit for Ewoq raters. Toolkit includes the following features:

1. Dark Mode: Enable dark mode on the rating portal 
2. Url Autolauncher: Automatically launch urls on a new task load and close urls from the previous task
3. Snipit Autopaste: Automatically paste snipit links to the rating task whenever a snipit is captured. This feature can be disabled using the popup dialog
